DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify prevalence characterization health elderly faller non-fallers southeastern community Brazil state São Paulo .
DOC.brief_title: Public Health Concerns Elderly Fallers Non-fallers Community
DOC.detailed_description: The population consist 638 elderly individual enrol attended team Family Health Strategy city Araraquara , São Paulo state . The sample select systematic way , consider order micro-areas , 1-7 , 10 % sample error , 15 % rate answer . To , instrument use base SABE Study , Health Wellbeing Aging modify , International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) , short version .
